page.title: 03TRADE
page.content: Gellifor has a rather large shop and it is very well stocked.Above there is a small flat.The shop is situated behind the chapel.Inside there is a burglar alarm fixed on the door where no one can see it.A few months ago new windows were put in with dark glass so that the food will not go stale. Local people and people from afar use the shop.The old people are the ones who use it the most because they have no transport,or the buses are too late or expensive to go to Denbigh or Ruthin.The shop closed for a few months about a year ago. While it was being sold people missed it,especially the children because they had to go to Llandyrnog,Denbigh or Ruthin for sweets and their favorite comics.
